rundown: 4-5 L vs Milwaukee Brewers Spencer Strider: 4.2 innings, 5 earned runs, 11 hits, 2 HR, 6 strikeouts Batters: Michael Harris II (1 hits - 3 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Jurickson Profar (1 hits - 3 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Sean Murphy (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 RBI) The Braves fell short in a close game against the Milwaukee Brewers, losing by a single run. The team's pitching struggled early, allowing five runs, which proved too much to overcome despite a late rally. Key highlights include: 1. Spencer Strider had a tough outing, giving up 11 hits and 5 earned runs in just under five innings. 2. Michael Harris II and Jurickson Profar both hit home runs, contributing to the Braves' offensive efforts. 3. The Braves managed to collect 8 hits but could not match the Brewers' 14 hits, leading to their defeat.
